content:
Required Support

  • A WEBDAV server is not required to support locking in any form

  • If a server does support locking, it may chose to support any combination of exclusive and shared locks.

  • Why? Systems differ markedly in the type of locking support they provide, and may not be able to support locks at all (i.e., some replicated stores)
